biocontainers.name: biosigner
biocontainers.summary: Discovery of significant signatures from omics data.

biotools.summary: This package implements a new method to assess the relevance of the variables for the prediction performances of the classifier. The approach can be run in parallel with the PLS-DA, Random Forest, and SVM binary classifiers. The signatures and the corresponding 'restricted' models are returned, enabling future predictions on new datasets.
